**TASK 3**
```{R TASK3}
#Matrix data frame are two way dimensions

m<- matrix(1:30, nrow = 5, ncol = 6, byrow = FALSE)
m

n<- matrix(c(1:30), nrow = 5, ncol = 6, byrow = TRUE)
n
#different
dim(n)
typeof(n)

#head() - shows first 6 rows
#tail() - shows last 6 rows
#dim() - returns the dimensions of data frame (i.e. number of rows and number of columns)
#nrow() - number of rows
#ncol() - number of columns
#str() - structure of data frame - name, type and preview of data in each column
#names() or colnames() - both show the names attribute for a data frame
#sapply(dataframe, class) - shows the class of each column in the data frame


data('mtcars')
head(mtcars)
```

**TASK 4**
```{R TASK4}
#tidyverse
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
ICE_Data <- read_csv("/Users/luke/Documents/HUDK4050/ICE1/ICE1_Data.csv")

ICE_Data

summary(ICE_Data)


ICE_Data_factor <- ICE_Data %>%
  mutate_if(sapply(ICE_Data, is.character), as.factor)
summary(ICE_Data_factor)

StudentProgressGraduation <- ICE_Data_factor %>%
  select('Progress_Rpt_10-11', 'graduation 2010-11')
StudentProgressGraduation

head(graduation201011)
graduation201011
```
